attributes.action: TO SEEK MULTILATERAL ECONOMIC SANCTIONS AGAINST TAX HAVENS
attributes.additional_details:
Tax havens are an economic drain on the World. They only exist to aid tax evasion, money laundering and criminal activity that seriously damages the UK and many other countries.
We the undersigned wish Her Majesty's Government to seek multilateral economic sanctions against any state that has set up their laws to act as tax havens until such time that their laws are ammended and allow outside inspection of their financial and legal companies.
